commons.title: Title
commons.deleteInvalidConversationsConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete all invalid conversations from the database?
commons.vanishOrphanConversations: Destroy all conversations without a user

commons.readyToClearAllConversations: Are you sure you want to clear all conversations?

errors.userNotAllowToUsePaidModel: User not allowed to use paid model
errors.cannotConnectMoreThanOneClient: Current user has a conversation waiting for reply, cannot request again
errors.userNotAllowToUseGPT4Model: Not allowed to use GPT-4 model
errors.userChatTypeExpired: The validity period of this conversation type has expired, please contact the administrator to increase the duration
errors.userNotAllowToAskAtThisTime: Questions are not allowed in the current time period

openai.401: OpenAI authorization failed (401 error), please contact the administrator
openai.403: OpenAI authorization failed (403 error), please contact the administrator
openai.404: OpenAI reports a 404 error, please contact the administrator
openai.429: OpenAI reports a 429 error, it may be that the model usage limit has been exceeded, please try again later
openai.500: OpenAI server error (500 error), it may be that the OpenAI service fails or the model API has changed, please inform the administrator
openai.unkown: OpenAI unknown error, please contact the administrator

errors.noAvailableModelAskCount: The remaining number of available ask count for this model is 0. Please contact the administrator to increase the number of times of use.
errors.noAvailableTotalAskCount: The total number of conversations is 0. Please contact the administrator to increase the number of conversations.

tips.loginExpired: Login expired. Do you want to go to the login page?
tips.queueing: Replying to other users, in queue...
tips.deleteConversation: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation? You cannot access this conversation anymore.
tips.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to log out?
tips.deleteUserConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
tips.invalidateConversation: Are you sure you want to mark these conversations as invalid? It will no longer appear in the user list.
tips.vanishConversation: Are you sure you want to destroy this conversation? It will be removed from the database and the records on the OpenAI account will be cleared.

Are you sure you want to update the configuration?

tips.invalidPassword: Invalid password: must be more than 6 digits, letters or symbols, without spaces
tips.seperate_settings: The following will set options for using ChatGPT Web and API respectively

NewConversationForm.failedToGetPlugins: Failed to get list of plugins

tips.openaiWebPluginsLengthMoreThan3: The number of plugins cannot exceed 3
tips.dragFileHere: Click or drag files or images here to upload
tips.fileUploadRequirements: Please do not upload files containing sensitive information; file size should not be larger than 512MB
tips.imageUploadRequirements: Up to 4 pictures can be uploaded
tips.sandboxFileNotFound: File {0} not found, either because the sandbox path is wrong or because the interpreter is expired.
tips.dragFileOrImageHere: Click or drag any file here to upload
tips.gpt4UploadingRequirements: No more than 10 files or images, each file no larger than 512MB. Please ensure the files do not contain sensitive information.

labels.allow_custom_openai_api: Allows use of custom OpenAI APIs
labels.per_model_ask_count: Limitation on the number of conversations per model
labels.title: title

openai_api.gpt_3_5: The fastest model, great for most everyday tasks.
openai_api.gpt_4: The most capable model, great for tasks that require creativity and advanced reasoning. Relatively slow.

openai_web.gpt_3_5: The fastest model, great for most everyday tasks.
openai_web.gpt_3_5_mobile: Mobile version of GPT-3.5. Not recommend to use.
openai_web.gpt_4: Browsing, Advanced Data Analysis, and DALL-E are now built into GPT-4.
openai_web.gpt_4_browsing: An experimental model that knows when and how to browse the internet.
openai_web.gpt_4_plugins: An experimental model that knows when and how to use plugins.
openai_web.gpt_4_mobile: Mobile version of GPT-4. Not recommend to use.
openai_web.gpt_4_code_interpreter:
An experimental model that can solve tasks by generating Python code and executing it in a Jupyter notebook.
You can upload any kind of file, and ask model to analyse it, or produce a new file which you can download.
openai_web.gpt_4_dalle: Try out GPT-4 with DALL·E 3 to generate images from natural text descriptions.

desc.daily_available_time_slots: It is only allowed to be used during these time periods of the day, if it is empty, it means unlimited.
desc.rate_limits: Define the maximum number of conversations a user can initiate within a certain time interval, and the priority is calculated from small to large time intervals.
desc.openai_web_installed_plugins: Note: Only the plugins enabled here can be selected when using GPT-4 Plugin!

config.enabled_models: Set which models are enabled globally. Models that are not enabled here will not be available for all accounts.
config.file_upload_strategy: Determined how to upload files when using the code interpreter model. See the documentation for details

content.syncConversations:
Are you sure you want to sync all conversations manually? 
This will fetch all conversations info from the OpenAI account and mark deleted conversations as invalid.
